description:
This mod is a modding Library that allow a lot of things for mods :[list]
[*]Access the informations of other mods in a local game like :[list]
[*]their differents sets (shape, tool, harvestable...),
[*]their custom Crafting recipes (craftbot, cookbot and trader),
[*]their Descriptions,[/list]
[*]Have all the informations of a part that are in his shapeset (size, flammable, stacksize, set path, original mod Id...),
[*]Introduce an all new tag system like Minecraft, if you want to check an item property, check if it's in a tag that specify this property (this depends on if modders registered their item tags, register your tags in the GFolder below)[/list]

For any suggestion/problems/questions, message me or ping on a server that I'm in on Discord : "[b]@ClashofCraft972[/b]"

For additional informations, check the link below :
https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1zq18JfoMygM5buyJ0P-Bj0eRGnY9rH9F?usp=drive_link
name: Compatibility Library
